attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We the undersigned urge the Prime Minister to grant the parole of Ronald Arthur Biggs. His continued incarceration does not benefit the British People and is unjustified. He is a sick, frail old man who poses no danger to society and was a minor participant in the crime he committed.

rejection.details: Individual legal cases are a matter for direct communication with the Home Office.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
